area: Mull of Galloway to Mull of Kintyre including the Firth of Clyde and North Channel (14)

forecast.wind: Northwesterly 5 to 7, occasionally gale 8 at first in North Channel, backing westerly or southwesterly 3 to 5 later.
forecast.sea: Smooth or slight in far north, elsewhere mainly slight or moderate, but moderate or rough at first in North Channel.
